page.title: 14HANWOOD PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content:
ST Thomas and ST Anne's Church of England Controlled Primary School has {117 pupils and 5.3 teachers.}The catchment area includes Hanwood, Cruckmeole and Lea Cross. 20 pupils come to school by bus.
School starts at 9am and finishes at 3.10pm. Breaks are between 10.45am and 11am and 12pm to 1.45pm.The school makes use of radio and television broadcasts and has its own micro computer. The school owns its own {mini bus.}Excursions are made locally and also to places such as London, Bath, York.
The school has its own kitchen which provides{school dinners.}The children have three choices of dinner each day. Many children bring sandwiches.
